author: RagnarokAngel
description: We're kicking off Alice's road to LVO this week as she preps for the Age of Sigmar GT.
title: [AOS] RagnarokAngel’s Road to LVO – Part 1

author: Marcille "Marcy" Donato
description: A full month has passed since the release of Umamusume: Pretty Derby, and by now many players, including perhaps yourself, have settled in to understand how Career Mode works (if not, here’s our Guide!), better understood Support Cards (and, again, if not, here’s our Guide on those!), and maybe you’ve started to run into the […]
title: Getting Started: How to Understand Sparks in Umamusume: Pretty Derby

author: Kevin Stillman
description: We look at the latest issue of Combat Patrol, which has Tyranids and Space Marines facing off in a new scenario called Bring it Down.
title: Contemptor Kevin’s Combat Patrol Issue #17 Review

author: Aaron "Lenoon" Bowen
description: Long teased and long awaited, the Victrix Foot Knights have arrived, and with them comes a shedload of hefty, mail-clad warriors ready to wreak havoc in the 12th and 13th centuries. Thanks to Victrix for sending over the materials for this review The Foot Knights were first announced back in the mists of time (possibly […]
title: Goonhammer Historicals Reviews: Victrix Foot Knights

author: NotThatHenryC
description: We were taken a bit by surprise when a Day -1 FAQ and Errata appeared for 30k. We’ve now looked through what’s changed and look at how significant it is. There are seven pages of changes, covering the core book and the Libers Astartes, Hereticus and Auxilia. You can download the FAQ from Warhammer Community […]
title: Goonhammer Hot Take: Horus Heresy FAQ and Errata

author: Robert "TheChirurgeon" Jones
description: We take a look at the math behind the changes to Black Templars Sword Brethren and Crusader Squads in the new Codex and look at how buffs from different characters affect those and their damage output.
title: Hammer of Math: Black Templars Crit Math from the New Codes

author: SRM
description: contact@40kbadcast.com Have any questions or feedback? Drop us a note in the comments below or email us at contact@goonhammer.com. title: 40k Badcast – Bonus Episode: Tacomacast 2025

author: MB1975
description: Neil Tennant, the former Smash Hits rock journalist better known as the vocalist for the Pet Shop Boys, described that great synthpop outfit’s output during the late 1980s as their “imperial phase”. It’s a phrase that’s gone on to be used to describe any musical artist when they manage to reach both commercial and artistic […]
title: Mikey Mouse Club #65 – Into the Inklands Fabled Picks!

author: Jay "Lorehunter" Kirkman
description: Rejoice! As Warhammer: The Horus Heresy – Age of Darkness’s Saturnine box makes its way into the wild, those (like me1) who picked theirs up this past weekend shed few tears about another relatively bookless week. Few wallets are bottomless, though I can’t say the week ahead will be entirely without purchase. After all, there’s […]
title: Black Library Weekly: And the Winner Is…
